name: Houssem Amamou
summary: Experienced Full Stack Developer with over 6 years of expertise in Typescript, React, and C#. Strong ability to articulate coding decisions and dedicated to delivering optimal solutions. Currently a senior website developer in the Website Connectivity team within R&D, focusing on integrating and supporting data connectors for systems like Sitecore and Sitemap.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
description: Enhanced and sustained website functionality using React and Typescript.
Optimized and maintained backend systems with dotnet.
Integrated Coveo’s API into Content Management Systems (Sitecore, AEM) using dotnet, Java, and Jenkins.
Implemented and managed CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions and Jenkins.

experience.title: Software Developer
description: Designed and implemented document generator libraries and associated tools.
Developed the Xpertdoc website to streamline document generation processes.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science

education.university: École Nationale des Sciences de l'Informatique, Tunisia
description: Thesis: Management and generation service for electronic documents.
Technologies: Java, J2EE, Spring, Hibernate, Docx4j, XDocReport, JXLS, POI, iText.
